Cash and Equivalents: cash and cash equivalents at carrying value
Marketable Securities (Short-term): available for sale debt securities amortized cost basis
available for sale securities debt securities
available for sale securities equity securities
debt securities available for sale allowance for credit loss
short term investments allowance for credit loss
Prepaid and Other Current Assets: reinsurance recoverable losses and loss expenses
reinsurance recoverables on paid and unpaid losses
Receivables: premiums receivable allowance for doubtful accounts

Intangible Assets (net): value of business acquired v o b a
Long-term Investments: debt securities held to maturity allowance for credit loss
held to maturity securities fair value
investments in affiliates subsidiaries associates and joint ventures
Other Non-Current Assets: financing receivable excluding accrued interest after allowance for credit loss
liability for future policy benefit reinsurance recoverable after allowance
loans and leases receivable net reported amount

Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income: accumulated other comprehensive income loss net of tax
Common Stock and APIC: additional paid in capital common stock

Accounts Payable and Accrued Expenses: payables to broker dealers and clearing organizations
Other Current Liabilities: liability for unpaid claims and claims adjustment expense reported and incurred but not reported i b n r claims
obligation to return securities received as collateral
Short-term Debt: securities sold under agreements to repurchase

Other Non-Current Liabilities: liability for claims and claims adjustment expense

__unmapped__: accounts payable and accrued liabilities current and noncurrent
cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents
common stock par or stated value per share
unearned e s o p shares
